Description.Text: BlueBay Beach Club is a perfect place to spend your holidays surrounded by sun and vegetation. This hotel will provide you with the following facilities: swimming-pool with jacuzzi, children's pool, game area, pool bar, restaurant, gym, boutique and supermarket. All the apartments are well-equipped at a high standard. They are equipped to offer you the holidays of your dreams. From these apartments you will be able to enjoy wonderful views of the sea while you are having a glass of cava on their terraces, listening to your favourite music (rooms with sound system) and enjoying the amazing sunsets. During your stay you should taste the specialities of our la carte restaurant "La Hacienda". Near Maspalomas and Playa del Ingles, where you can revel in its bars, shops, leisure areas, restaurants and attractive night life.
Located closed to the sea in San Agustn, Gran Canaria. Just 15 min. away from "Playa del Ingles" and the area of "Playa de Maspalomas", 500 m. from the bus stop and 10 min away from the city centre.

1 Bedroom Apartment - Apartmens full eqquiped where you will be able to enjoy from impressive views to the sea to spectacular sunsets.
- 42,48 m2 aprox - Maximum capacity 4 persons - 2 twin beds - Terrace of 10,50 m2 aprox - Separated living room area - Double sofa bed in the living room - Complete bathroom - Bathrobes - Full eqquiped kitchenette with refrigerator, microwaves, household items
- Air conditioning in the bedroom - Iron and Ironing board - Wireless internet access * - In-room safe *
* Avilable with extra charge

- Air conditioning in the bedroom - Iron and Ironing board - Wireless internet access * - In-room safe *

2 Bedroom Apartment - Apartmens wide and with two rooms full eqquiped where you will be able to enjoy from impressive views to the sea to spectacular sunsets.
- 82,25 m2 aprox - Maximum capacity 6 persons - 4 twin beds, separated in two differents rooms - Terrace of 21,60 m2 aprox - Private hydromassage in terrace - Separated living room area - Double sofa bed in the living room - Two complete bathroom - Bathrobes - Full eqquiped kitchenette with refrigerator, microwaves, household items
- Air conditioning in the bedroom - Iron and Ironing board - Wireless internet access * - In-room safe *
